author: yiannisbot
content:
ProbeLab has deployed a tool to monitor uptime of Ethereum's discv4 & discv5 bootstrapper nodes:
https://probelab.io/ethereum/bootstrappers/discv4/
https://probelab.io/ethereum/bootstrappers/discv5/

The tool can be used to monitor the uptime of any node (doesn't have to be a bootstrapper) based on their libp2p multiaddress or ENR. Ping me if there's interest for other nodes to be added to the list üëç
